title: Dacor Resaissance Cooktop RGC365 Overview
description:
Buy Dacor Renaissance Natural Gas Cooktop RGC365 - http://www.abt.com/resources/pages/search.php?keywords=rgc365 

Features:
• 5 Burners: 3 Dual-Stacked Sealed and 2 SimmerSearTM
• SimmerSear Burners
For ultimate precision SimmerSear Burners are ideal for simmering and searing at ultra-low or ultra-high temperatures - up to 18000 BTUs.
• Easy Clean-Up
The sealed gas burners and one-piece spill basin feature an exlusive bead-blasted finish making daily clean-up easier than ever.
• IlluminaTM Burner Controls 
Stylish and luminous these die-cast knobs glow Dacors signature blue when turned on. Our SimmerSafe Indicator Lights signal when the burners are on ensuring a safe environment.
• Perma-FlameTM Automatic Reignition 
• Smart FlameTM Technology 
• 2 12 Extra-Wide Continuous Platform Grates
Provide plenty of room for oversized pots and pans for an especially spacious cooking surface.
• 1 10 Extra-Wide Continuous Platform Grate
• Protected Ignitors 
• Brass Valves 
• Raised Ventilation Compatible
